item.title: CSS action pseudo classes
item.description: Without JavaScript, dynamic UI is possible with just CSS action class selectors. Case study Help text for input element which is only visible when the input is focused. The HTML <div class="input-cont"> <input type="text" placeholder="Focus me" autofocus /> <span class="help" data-help="Enter your email"></span> </div> To achieve the above, a span holding the help text in a data-help attribute as a sibling to the actual input. Both the input and the span are children to a parent div with class name input-cont.
